<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 14"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Greater Interpose](/Feats.aspx?ID=1688) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Champion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=24" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 121 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Sentinel](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=76) (Level 16)

**Prerequisites**
[Sacrifice Armor](/Feats.aspx?ID=1678)

</column>

---

Your divine grace empowers you to avoid hits when you otherwise could not. You can use [Sacrifice Armor](/Feats.aspx?ID=1678) to reduce any type of damage from an attack or effect requiring a Reflex save. When you use Sacrifice Armor against a critical hit or a critical failure on a Reflex save that would otherwise cause you to take double damage, you take the normal amount of damage instead.
name: Greater Interpose
